experience.title: Experience
experience.content: Worked on deep systems & fullstack projects

projects.mm: A tool to uncover hidden drop rates in MixMaster. When the GameMaster refused to reveal Hench monsters' drop rates, I found the formula and built this tool, giving players transparency and predictive simulations for their grind.
projects.ellia: A Discord bot for the mobile game Summoners War that lets players summon monsters and share their collections. I developed this bot to recreate the excitement of gacha pulls with friends, featuring higher drop rates than the original game and a system to save obtained monsters.
projects.wizard: Developed in just a few days during an Epitech project, this game prototype leverages Unreal's Blueprint system to create an immersive experience without writing a single line of code. A technical challenge completed in record time, demonstrating my ability to quickly master complex visual scripting tools.
projects.schooladventure: Education video game for kids (elementary level) with parental dashboard. Developed as a team project during my final year at Epitech, this game features 10+ mini-games that cover multiple subjects.
projects.portfolio: I took the opportunity of building this portfolio to improve my skills in two key technologies: React for the structure and Tailwind CSS for styling. This project allowed me to explore the efficiency of Utility-First CSS while strengthening my fundamentals in React components.
